The PLR-16 is a gas operated, semi-automatic pistol chambered in 5.56mm NATO caliber. It was designed and intended as a long range target and hunting pistol. It has a conventional gas piston operation and utilizes the proven M-16 breech locking system. The rear sight is adjustable for windage. The front sight is of M-16 type. An integrated MIL-STD 1913 picatinny rail will accept a multitude of standard accessories. The muzzle end of the barrel is threaded .5-28 TPI to accept standard attachments such as a muzzle brake. Except for the barrel, bolt, sights and mechanism, the PLR-16 pistol is made entirely of high-impact glass fiber reinforced polymer.

Thompson Center Hawken .50 Cal

Summary: I made this gun around 1979-80 from a Thompson Center Kit. 

Thompson Center Hawken 50 Cal Rifle

This Thompson Center .50 caliber Hawken muzzleloading rifle is in excellent condition. The bore is excellent. The brass hardware has a nice patina finish, that if desired, could easily be returned to a bright finish. Thompson Center produced this high quality rifle for several decades until 2012, with a MSRP of $869.99l. This Hawken is dead accurate and has taken three deer, each with an instant kill shop ranging from about 25 yds out to over 80 yrds. With the set trigger it is capable of hitting a coffee can every time from 200 yds but I have never shot at game I didn't know was a dead shot with it. I haven't hunted or shot the rifle since the mid-80's.

title: For Sale:  S&W 629-4 Classic 6.5" - .44 MAGNUM
postcontent:
Up for trade is a Smith & Wesson Mod. 629-4 Classic chambered in .44 Magnum. It is a 6-shot n-frame revolver with a 6.5 inch barrel and S&W labeled hogue rubber grips (RB). This Mod. 629 has the -4 designation which is the last dash model that is pre-lock and pre-MIM revolver with the complete factory Endurance Package. The endurance package was created in response to silhouette shooters who were using heavy bullets loaded as fast as possible. S&W simply beefed up these revolvers to last a lot longer and to be able to take more of a beating. It entails as follows: strengthened hand & bolt, strengthened retention system on the yoke/cylinder crane, hardened yoke and frame, radius-ed internal studs, and elongated bolt cuts on the cylinder.

I would consider this to be in great condition with very good lock up, perfect timing, and excellent cylinder-forcing cone gap. If you want a Smith & Wesson .44 magnum you will NOT be disappointed with this one! It comes with its original factory box/papers and 25 rds of 240 gr Winchester soft points ("Deer & Black Bear").

I would be interested in other smaller caliber (.38/.357) S&W revolvers and 1911's. I may be interested in others, just ask. Even trades or with cash my way only. Price is $900 in the Murfreesboro area.

Gun is located in the Central/Middle TN area. Must be 21 years old, a Tennessee resident, and not a convicted felon. Drivers License required, HCP preferred.

title: For Sale:  S&W 629-4 Classic 6.5" - .44 Mag
postcontent:
Up for trade is a Smith & Wesson Mod. 629-4 Classic chambered in .44 Magnum. It is a 6-shot n-frame revolver with a 6.5 inch barrel and S&W labeled hogue rubber grips (RB). This Mod. 629 has the -4 designation which is the last dash model that is pre-lock and pre-MIM (forged hammer & trigger) revolver with the complete factory Endurance Package. The endurance package was created in response to silhouette shooters who were using heavy bullets loaded as fast as possible. S&W simply beefed up these revolvers to last a lot longer and to be able to take more of a beating. It entails as follows: hardened hand & bolt, hardened retention system on the yoke/cylinder crane, hardened yoke and frame, radius-ed internal studs, and elongated bolt cuts on the cylinder.

I would consider this to be in great condition with very good lock up, perfect timing, and excellent cylinder-forcing cone gap. If you want a Smith & Wesson .44 magnum you will NOT be disappointed with this one! It comes with its original factory box/papers and 25 rds of 240 gr Winchester soft points ("Deer & Black Bear").

I would be interested in other smaller caliber (.38/.357) S&W revolvers and 1911's. I may be interested in others, just ask. Even trades or with cash my way only. Price is $950 $900 in the Murfreesboro area.

Gun is located in the Central/Middle TN area. Must be 21 years old, a Tennessee resident, and not a convicted felon. Drivers License required, HCP preferred.

title: For Sale:  CZ Dan Wesson 1911 9mm 01968 ECO
postcontent:
The ECO wears tritium night sights with our tactical ledge sight on the rear of our lightweight 3.5‚Äù slide. The barrel is a flush-cut ramped bull barrel with target crown rather than the traditional barrel and barrel bushing. This makes the gun slightly more compact and easier to disassemble. The recoil system is quite unique for this style of 1911 as we use a solid, one piece guide rod and a flat recoil spring that is rated for 15,000. That is 15,000 rounds! Not 500 rounds like most 1911 dual recoil systems are rated for. This is unheard of in a production 1911! This recoil system also gives the benefit of a smooth slide for easier operation and less felt recoil. 

Trigger pull, like all of our 1911s, is short and crisp at around 4 lbs. This helps achieve the accuracy you‚Äôve come to expect from a Dan Wesson. The frame is anodized aluminum and features an undercut trigger guard and 25 LPI checkering. The mainspring housing is also aluminum with 25 LPI checkering and a rounded bottom corner for concealability and shooting comfort. These features coupled with the Ed Brown high ride grip safety and our new slim line DW carry G10 grips really help you hold onto the gun for faster follow-up shots and recoil control. 

Specifications and Features: CZ Dan Wesson ECO Semi Auto Handgun 9mm Luger 3.5" barrel Flush cut ramped bull barrel with target crown 7 round magazine capacity Fixed night sights Tactical ledge rear sight 25 LPI checkering Thumb Safety Grip Safety Length: 7.25" Width: 1.45" Height: 5" Weight: 24.9 ounces

title: Want To Buy:  a nagant revolver
postcontent: Under limited circumstances is a common Nagant revolver worth even close to $200 by itself.  It would have to have a grade of 98% or better. The blueing should still be bright but can have small areas of discoloration and wear, that being said, I want one maybe 2 Nagant revolvers. Caliber	12 gauge 3‚Äù

The KSG (Kel-Tec Shotgun) is Kel-Tec CNC‚Äôs first entry into the shotgun market. The size, shape, and design is similar to the currently available Kel-Tec RFB rifle, but the KSG ejects downward, instead of forward. The KSG weighs 6.9 lbs. and is as compact as legally possible with a 26.1‚Äù overall length and an 18.5‚Äù cylinder bore barrel. Even with this compact size, the internal dual tube magazines hold an impressive 12 rounds of 12 gauge 3‚Äù rounds in total (6 per tube). It can also reliably shoot shells as short as 1 3/4" up to the 3".
This simple and reliable pump action feeds from either the left or right tube. The feed side is manually selected by a lever located behind the trigger guard.

The pump includes an under picatinny rail for the mounting of a forward grip, a light, or a laser. The included top picatinny sight rail will accept many types of optics or iron sights. Forward and rear sling loops are built in, and a basic sling is included. The soft rubber butt pad helps to tame recoil.

The KSG receiver is made from hardened steel and includes the magazine tubes which have been welded in place. The grip and stock assembly is made of glass reinforced nylon (Zytel) and is easily disassembled by pushing out 2 pins, which store in 2 holes in the grip when removed. The barrel and pump assembly is removed by loosening the 2 front magazine tube nuts with a coin and sliding the assembly forward.

This will make an excellent firearm for home defense & range practice.

The Taurus PT 845 is derived from the Taurus OSS pistol, which Taurus designed for the U.S. Armed Forces. The PT 845 adds an external hammer and is now ready with Strike Two capability. If you have had a hard primer and the gun misfires, the Taurus PT 845 senses this and automatically gives you instant Strike Two capability by resetting the trigger for automatic double action re-strike. No need to do anything else, simply pull the trigger. Research indicates a 93% or better chance the round will fire on re-strike. When it fires, the PT 845 will automatically revert to single action by itself. If it falls on a dead primer, simply manually recharge and keep going.

NO TRADES at this time.

-Premium air-gauged ‚Äúcontract‚Äù stainless barrel 1/7 twist; contoured and chambered by the same individual that does the work for Crane.

-Come with an Operator‚Äôs Manual too

This rifle is built to shoot 77gr Black Hills OTM ammo and the break is set up for a Opsinc 12th model suppressor. Just buy the "Can " and you can throw it right on.

Since completing the build there have been absolutely 0 rds put through it. I deployed within a week of finishing it and didn't have time to even test it. This rifle is 100% brand new. Even the Colt upper and lower (6920) came off of a brand new rifle.

currently I do not have access to the rifle itself so I posted 2 pictures of the parts. 

This is how I want the deal to happen. If you decide you want to see or buy the item I will have a friend of mine (who is watching my house while I am deployed) go in to my safe and take the rifle to "Stop, Drop and Shop Pawn on Academy." The transfer paperwork will be done on the spot and you can leave with the rifle at that point. I have worked with this shop many times for both selling and buying firearms. 

For this reason they will only accept Cash. Or you can pay me directly through paypal online and I will have them deliver the rifle to the shop. You will be responsible for all fees at the shop. title: For Sale:  HK VP70 Z with 5 Magazines, Factory Box, Target, Owners Manual
postcontent:
Like New Condition. Minimal Signs of Age or Wear. Includes optional 5lb mainspring.

It was the first polymer-framed pistol and predates the Glock 17 by 12 years. The weapon weighed 820 g (28.9 oz) unloaded, lighter than most other metal framed pistols of the time. 

One unique feature of this weapon involved the combination stock/holster for the martial version of the VP70. The stock incorporates a selector switch that, when mounted, allows selective fire. Cyclic rate of fire for the three-round burst is 2200 rounds per minute. When not mounted, the stock acts as a holster. The VP70 uses a spring-loaded striker like a Glock, instead of a conventional firing pin. In lieu of a blade front sight, the VP70 uses a polished ramp with a central notch in the middle to provide the illusion of a dark front post.

postcontent: I have a rare , pre war, walther ppk in quite good condition for its age. My research of the guns serial # put the guns date of manufacture at 1937. My grandfather brought this gun home from Germany WWII. The neat little gun was then basically hidden away and not seen until my father died in 2010 and it was then passed to me. I purchased a box of .32 ACP or 7.65mm as printed on the gun and test fired it for what must have been its first shot in approx. 65 yrs. postcontent: The SUPER-SHORTY is based on a Mossberg Maverick (also available on Mossberg 500 or Remington 870 at additional cost) 12-gauge shotgun which came from the factory with a pistol grip. Because of this, the SUPER-SHORTY is considered an AOW (Any Other Weapon) and can be transferred with a $5 stamp! The gun holds two 2-3/4" or 3" shells in the magazine, plus one in the chamber. The 16.5" overall length, 6.5" barrel and spring-locked foregrip, which pivots out of the way when not in use, make for a very compact package. As far as we know, this is the shortest 12-gauge pump shotgun available. All parts for the SUPER-SHORTY are made in-house on our own CNC machinery using materials ideally suited to the task. All welds are done by the TIG process, and the manganese phosphate finish is MIL-spec. The SUPER-SHORTY is currently being used by various law enforcement agencies and military units worldwide. If you like the idea of concealed carry with a 12-gauge, or like a lot of "bang" in a small package, or just want the most compact breaching weapon available, then this is the gun for you.
